SEARCH
Package io.avery.conveyor

Interface Belt.Station

All Superinterfaces:
Belt.Stage
Enclosing class:
Belt
public static sealed interface Belt.Station extends Belt.Stage
A Stage that represents connected Source and Sink stages. A station may enclose:
  • A StepSource connected to a Sink
  • A Source connected to a StepSink
  • A Station connected to a Station (and thereby, any sequence of Stations)

A station itself accepts no input and yields no output. The run method interacts with stations by draining enclosed sources to sinks.

See Also:
  • Belt.Stage.run(Executor)

    • compose

      default Belt.Station compose(Belt.Station upstream)
      Connects the upstream station before this station. Returns a new station that, when run, runs this station and the upstream station.
      Parameters:
      upstream - the upstream station
      Returns:
      a new station that runs this station and the upstream station
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if upstream is null

    • compose

      default <T> Belt.Sink<T> compose(Belt.Sink<? super T> upstream)
      Connects the upstream sink before this station. Returns a new sink that behaves like the upstream sink, except that running it will also run this station.
